summary: A comet crashes into a Japanese forest and a group of mighty ninjas must fight a group of killer Aliens before they reach their village and kill everyone.
cast: Masanori Mimoto|Shûji Kashiwabara|Donpei Tsuchihira|Mika Hijii|Yûki Ogoe|Ben Hiura|Kenji Saito|Hidetaka Nishio|Kentarô Shimazu|Hideto Washizu|Isamu Sugihara|Taro Kanazawa|Kôji Inagaki|Hideaki Morikawa|Kyôsuke Sasaki|Yumiko Tomokura|Shuya Mashita|Hajime Inoue|Koji Ueda|Katsu Itagaki
title: Alien vs. Ninja
